product.title: Celebrate Everything 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle • Galison x Oxford Pennant Original
product.description: The Celebrate Everything 1000 Piece Puzzle in Square Box from features a collage of colorful pendants each with celebratory messages. Galison puzzles are packaged in matte-finish sturdy boxes, perfect for gifting, reuse, and storage. - Puzzle Size: 27 x 20", 686 x 508mm - Box Size: 8 x 8 x 1.5", 203 x 203 x 41mm - 1000 Pieces, Ribbon Cut - Includes Puzzle Insert with Full Puzzle Image - Minimal Puzzle Dust
product.descriptionHtml:
The Celebrate Everything 1000 Piece Puzzle in Square Box from features a collage of colorful pendants each with celebratory messages. Galison puzzles are packaged in matte-finish sturdy boxes, perfect for gifting, reuse, and storage.

- Puzzle Size: 27 x 20", 686 x 508mm 

- Box Size: 8 x 8 x 1.5", 203 x 203 x 41mm

- 1000 Pieces, Ribbon Cut

- Includes Puzzle Insert with Full Puzzle Image

- Minimal Puzzle Dust
